params.assetAmount: The number of ERC20 tokens to deposit and send
params.sendParam: Parameters on how to send the shares to the recipient

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.details: To ensure non-reentrancy, implementers of this interface MUST assert msg.sender is the corresponding EndpointV2 contract (i.e., onlyEndpointV2).

params._executor: The address of the executor for the composed message.
params._extraData: Additional arbitrary data in bytes passed by the entity who executes the lzCompose.
params._from: The address initiating the composition, typically the OApp where the lzReceive was called.
params._guid: The unique identifier for the corresponding LayerZero src/dst tx.
params._message: The composed message payload in bytes. NOT necessarily the same payload passed via lzReceive.

quoteSend(address,address,uint256,(uint3.details: This function can be overridden to implement custom quoting logic

params.from: The "sender address" used for the quote
params.sendParam: The parameters for the send operation
params.targetOft: The OFT contract address to quote
params.vaultInAmount: The amount of tokens to send to the vault

returns._0: MessagingFee The estimated fee for the send operation

params.refundAddress: Address to receive excess payment of the LZ fees
params.sendParam: Parameter that defines how to send the assets
params.shareAmount: The number of vault shares to redeem

depositAndSend(uint256,(uint32,bytes32,u.notice: Deposits ERC20 assets from the caller into the vault and sends them to the recipient

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.notice: Composes a LayerZero message from an OApp.

quoteSend(address,address,uint256,(uint3.notice: Quotes the send operation for the given OFT and SendParam

redeemAndSend(uint256,(uint32,bytes32,ui.notice: Redeems vault shares and sends the resulting assets to the user
